thread.title: Schedule of Upcoming Luncheons at the National Press Club -
thread.title_full: Schedule of Upcoming Luncheons at the National Press Club -

author: National Press Club
title: Schedule of Upcoming Luncheons at the National Press Club -
text:
WASHINGTON , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Following is a schedule of upcoming luncheons at the National Press Club. Luncheon tickets are open to the public except where noted as "members and guests only."  Credentialed press may cover Luncheons and Newsmakers. Events listed are subject to last-minute changes. Space may be reserved at any NPC Luncheon by calling 202-662-7501. To save time and avoid waiting in line, tickets can be paid for in advance by using a credit card or putting tickets on a house account if there is a credit card on file with the Club. Reservations are not required for Newsmakers, unless otherwise noted. To find out more about what's happening at the National Press Club, check out the National Press Club's Web site at www.press.org or email mcooke@press.org .
NPC Luncheon are open to credentialed members of the media.
Luncheon tickets are open to the public except where noted as "members and guests only".
All NPC Luncheons are held in the National Press Club Ballroom unless otherwise noted.
New events or updated information indicated by 
October 28, 2015 – THIS EVENT WILL BE HELD AT GEORGETOWN UNIVERSITY SCHOOL OF CONTINUING STUDIES, 640 MASSACHUSETTS AVENUE, ATRIUM
Abby Wambach , U.S. World Cup Winner
Topic: Wambach will discuss being a member of the 2015 world champions that defeated Japan 5-2, and its impact on women's soccer and the future of the game and women's sports.
To purchase tickets click here 
Dec 2, 2015 – THIS EVENT IS IN THE HOLEMAN LOUNGE
Deborah Lee James , Secretary of the Air Force 
Topic: James will speak about budget cuts, sexual assaults and other issues facing the Air Force
To purchase tickets click here 
Dec 8, 2015 – THIS EVENT IS IN THE HOLEMAN LOUNGE
Dr. David J. Skorton , Secretary, Smithsonian 
Topic: TBA
To purchase tickets click here 
National Press Club Luncheons are webcast live on press.org at 1:00 pm (except where time change is noted) on event day.
Follow the conversation on Twitter using the hashtag #NPCLunch, or on Facebook at (facebook.com/PressClubDC) and Twitter (@PressClubDC).
CONTACT: Melinda Cooke of the National Press Club, +1-202-662-7516, mcooke@press.org 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20080917/NPCLOGO 
 

SOURCE National Press Club
